attributes.action: Introduce Lockdown and restrictions as cases are raising.
attributes.additional_details: The new covid varient is really dangerous. The vaccines are not working, this means that government should act fast and implement lockdown and school closures and lockdown by december before the death rates and covid cases rise.
attributes.background: Schools and colleges need to be closed down as we reach the winter season, cases would be increased and would spread quick. We should close down the schools, so we prevent cases increase like last year. We need to act now, before we regret it.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599364
